author: Daniel Sims
title: Nvidia reaches historic 92% GPU market share, leaves AMD and Intel far behind
description: According to Jon Peddie Research, total sales of dedicated desktop graphics cards reached 9.2 million units in the first quarter of 2025 – an increase of more than 8% both year-over-year and quarter-over-quarter. Although both Nvidia and AMD launched new GPU …
content: The big picture: In our review of the 8GB variant of Nvidia's RTX 5060 Ti, we suggested that the GeForce 50 lineup might go down as the company's worst ever. Yet despite scarcity at more reasonable p… [+3001 chars]
